message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm proposing an exclusive introductory price of $125. This is an excellent chance to experience the product's full capabilities at a special rate. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.
